text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of triangle ABC.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of triangle ABC.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line CA is 10 units.
The length of the line CM is 6 units.
Point M lies on the line connecting A and B.
The line CM is perpendicular to the line MB.
The line CA is perpendicular to the line CB.
line_instances: There are lines CA, CM, CB, forming triangle ABC.
There are lines AM, AB, MB, forming triangle AMB.
